casebody.data:
PITTS
v.
NASH DAY HOSPITAL. No. 22A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 14, 2005. Barry S. Cobb, James T. Newman, Jr., Raleigh, for Harris, Wilson & OB-GYN Asso. Charles S. Rountree, Tarboro, Charles Albert, for Jennifer L. Pitts.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of March 2005 by North Carolina Association of Defense Attorneys for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of March 2005."
